Package controller

Class AddCustomerController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddCustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Author:
Thoai Tran
This is the Add Customer Controller Class. This class handles the mechanics to load user input into the SQL DB To create a new customer record.

    • saveButton

      void saveButton​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This is the Save Button. This methods loads the user input into the SQL DB. Validates Input by making sure all fields. Makes sure that countries and first-level divisions match.
      Parameters:
      event - event.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
